meanings.definition: To hide or keep something secret
meanings.sent1: The magician conceals the rabbit in his hat.
meanings.sent2: She conceals her diary under the bed to keep it safe.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel conceals its acorns in various hiding spots around the garden.
meanings.sent4: The fog conceals the outline of the distant mountains.
meanings.sent5: The detective's disguise perfectly conceals his true identity.

meanings.definition: To prevent something from being seen or known
meanings.sent1: The thick fog conceals the view of the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: The mask conceals her emotions during the performance.
meanings.sent3: The clever spy conceals the secret documents in a hollowed-out book.
meanings.sent4: The darkness of the night conceals the movements of nocturnal animals.
meanings.sent5: The encryption code conceals the sensitive information from unauthorized access.
